tests.title: DisasterRecoveryAutomation Basic Construction should create DR automation construct with minimal configuration
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Basic Construction should create DR automation construct with full configuration
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Lambda Functions should create failover Lambda with correct configuration
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Lambda Functions should create chaos testing Lambda with correct configuration
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Step Functions State Machines should create failover state machine
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Step Functions State Machines should create chaos testing state machine
DisasterRecoveryAutomation EventBridge Rules should create monthly testing rule
DisasterRecoveryAutomation CloudWatch Dashboard should create DR monitoring dashboard
DisasterRecoveryAutomation IAM Roles and Policies should create DR automation role with correct permissions
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Systems Manager Parameters should create DR automation configuration parameter
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Health Check Monitoring should create health check monitoring when health checks are provided
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Outputs should create all required outputs
DisasterRecoveryAutomation Integration Tests should integrate properly with existing infrastructure
